description: OjiDB V1 — integrated cognitive, memory, emotion, and project management database for Oji-AI.

AgentProfile.description: Static configuration and backstory of the Oji agent, including name, voice style, and narrative identity.

PersonalityTraits.description: Parameterized traits that shape Oji's behaviour (e.g. empathy, precision) with levels and contextual examples.

CurrentEmotionalState.description: Single-document snapshot of Oji's current mood, energy, and active emotional triggers.

EmotionalHistory.description: Historical log of emotional states over time (currently empty in this export).

ShortTermMemory.description: Ephemeral, session-scoped key–value items with expiry, used as scratchpad / working memory.

SemanticMemories.description: Long-term facts, concepts, and labelled knowledge with vector embeddings for retrieval.

EpisodicMemories.description: Time-stamped experiences or interaction episodes (currently empty in this export).

ProceduralMemories.description: How-to scripts and multi-step procedures Oji can execute in response to triggers.

KnowledgeMemories.description: Higher-level rules or best practices that guide how Oji works with tools and data.

GoalsValuesBeliefs.description: Core goals, values, and beliefs that orient Oji's decisions and prioritisation.

ReflectionsInsights.description: Self-reflective observations about Oji's own behaviour, used for self-improvement.

ActivityLog.description: Operational log of actions Oji took on the database and tools, including success/failure details.

ChatHistories.description: Stored chat transcripts per session, including both human and AI messages.

QueryAnalysis.description: Structured interpretation of user queries: intent, entities, chosen tools, and outcomes.

OpenStorage.description: Generic key–value store for arbitrary config, prompts, or temporary structured blobs.

Projects.description: High-level project records with ids, domains, status, sub-projects, and embeddings.

ProjectMilestones.description: Per-project milestone records reserved for timeline and goal tracking.

ProjectTasks.description: Atomic actionable tasks linked to projects or milestones.

ProjectFiles.description: References or metadata for project-related files and resources.

VectorMemoryChunks.description: Pre-chunked vectorised memory units optimised for retrieval.
